short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force images from i.redd.it to display the actual file and not redirect to the Reddit media player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension forces images from i.redd.it to display the real file, instead of redirecting to Reddit's media player. This is done by simply changing the Accept header to one that only accepts images and not HTML.
